title: [CGcookie] Creating a Little Elephant Character in Blender
description:
Creating a Little Elephant Character in Blender

Please welcome Josh Maule to Blender Cookie with his first tutorial on
creating this cute scene of a little stuffed elephant and mouse.
In this Blender tutorial you will learn everything needed to put together 
this scene, including the modeling, texturing, lighting and rendering.

Part 01 of this series covers all the modeling of the elephant character, 
the mouse, and the bag of peanuts.
Part 02 of this series shows you how to create a tileable fabric texture, 
how to unwrap all the UVs, how to create the fabric fuzz with particles, and 
how to set up the complete scene for lighting and rendering.
